lead_paragraph: The payroll processor’s report, which covers only private businesses, showed steady hiring despite concerns about slowing growth.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Report by ADP Shows Increase in Private Sector Hiring
headline.main: Private Sector Adds 200,000 Jobs, ADP Says

snippet: The payroll processor’s report, which covers only private businesses, showed steady hiring despite concerns about slowing growth.
abstract: ADP reports private companies in America added 200,000 jobs in March, with strongest gains in construction, retail and shipping, and only slight rise in manufacturing.
